DOC.HEAD: Current Quotations
DOC.TEXT: ``Things are not returning to normal because we don't know what normality is. We have to learn how to live as decent, normal beings. We know about civilized life only from books, from our traditions and from our parents. Nobody here knows it personally.'' _ Ion Visoiu, a librarian in Romania.

``I want to see this man who is under indictment brought to justice for poisoning the children of the United States of America and people around the world.'' _ President Bush on his pursuit of ousted Panamanian dictator Manuel Antonio Noriega.

``It's pretty grim. No, it's very grim. We're telling people $1.29 a gallon and they can't afford it. I don't blame them for being upset.'' _ Sam Livieri Jr., vice president of Apple Oil Co. in Branford, Conn., on the angry reaction to skyrocketing home heating oil prices.
